稰字的基本解释

稰
xǔ
晚稻。
食。
古同“糈”，古代祭神用的精米：“费椒稰以要神兮。”

稰
xū
谷类植物子实脱落的样子。
古同“胥”。

稰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xǔ］
［《廣韻》私吕切，上語，心。］
(1)成熟晚的稻子。即今晚稻。
(2)通“糈”。精米。

稰字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　稰； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页856第23
【廣韻】相居切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】新於切，?音胥。禾子落貌。　又熟穫也。【禮·內則】稰穛。【註】熟穫曰稰，生穫曰穛。　又【廣韻】私呂切【集韻】【韻會】寫與切，?音醑。義同。　又【韻會補】爽阻切，音所。祭神米。【前漢·揚雄傳】費椒稰以要神兮。

稰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
稰字的起名意思

暂无。

稰
Basic explanation of words
稰
xǔ
Late rice.
food.
The ancient Tong "糈", the polished rice used to worship gods in ancient times: "Fei Jiaoyan is to be a god."
稰
xū
The appearance of the seeds of a cereal plant falling off.
Ancient Tong "Xu".
稰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xǔ]
["Guangyun" Private Lu Qi, Shangyu, Heart. ]
(1) Rice that matures late. That is rice tonight.
(2) Through "糈". Polished rice.
稰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [He Zi Department] 　稰; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 856 23
[Guangyun] Xiangjuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] New Yuqie,? Yinxu. Hezi's appearance.　Finished again. 【Rite · Nei Zhe】稰稰稰. [Note] The harvest is called 稰, and the harvest is called 稛.　 [Guang Yun] Private Lu Qi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Writing and cutting,? Yin 醑. The same meaning.　[Rhyme will make up] cool and cut, sound so. Worship rice. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Fei Jiaoyan wanted to be fascinating.
